name: HydroCAD Unit Hydrograph Definitions File
summary: Learn about .HUH files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: HUH files are forward compatible with different versions of HydroCAD.

description: Definitions file used by HydroCAD, a CAD water drainage solutions program; contains unit hydrograph definitions that predict water runoff from short bursts of rainfall; stored in ASCII text format; represents one of several files in an overall HydroCAD project.
